string-array.name: whats_new_260
string-array.item: Material design
Improved tablet layout
Support for Samsung Knox

string-array.name: whats_new_251
string-array.item: Configurable number format
Danish translation

string-array.name: whats_new_250
string-array.item: CSV import
Korean translation

string-array.name: whats_new_249
string-array.item: Export categories to QIF
Display aggregate sums in home screen widget

string-array.name: whats_new_248
string-array.item: The status of cloned transactions is reset to unreconciled
Alternative restore method for devices without file manager

string-array.name: whats_new_247
string-array.item: Clone command opens editing form

string-array.name: whats_new_246
string-array.item: Transactions can be set to state "Void"

string-array.name: whats_new_245
string-array.item: Export and reset functionality can now be applied to transactions matched by search filter

string-array.name: whats_new_244
string-array.item: Search filter for duration
Filters for method, payee, status and category now allow multiple selection
Basque translation

string-array.name: whats_new_243
string-array.item: If application is password protected, pictures are stored securely in internal storage

string-array.name: whats_new_242
string-array.item: Attach picture to transaction

string-array.name: whats_new_241
string-array.item: Pie chart visualizing distribution per category

string-array.name: whats_new_240
string-array.item: Transform normal transaction into split transaction

string-array.name: whats_new_239
string-array.item: Upon database restore, plans are now recreated
New translations: Bulgarian, Croatian and Romanian

string-array.name: whats_new_238
string-array.item: Japanese translation
Transaction groups can be collapsed

string-array.name: whats_new_237
string-array.item: Payment methods are sorted alphabetically

string-array.name: whats_new_236
string-array.item: Customize grouping of accounts in account list
Group headers now show previous balance and net gain/loss

string-array.name: whats_new_235
string-array.item: From distribution screen, display list of transactions per category
Improved payer/payee autocomplete

string-array.name: whats_new_234
string-array.item: Customizable number of fraction digits for currencies
Allow to exclude accounts from totals

string-array.name: whats_new_233
string-array.item: Redesign of account list: User-defined sort order
Group sums in transaction list takes filters into account

string-array.name: whats_new_232
string-array.item: Print to PDF now supports non-Western scripts
Malaya translation

string-array.name: whats_new_231
string-array.item: Autofill from last transaction for same payee/payer
Instantiate template upon short tap on entry in template list
Configurable encoding for QIF import

string-array.name: whats_new_230
string-array.item: Print transaction list to PDF file (Premium)

string-array.name: whats_new_220
string-array.item: Search for transactions per category, amount, comment, status, payee/payer, payment method
